overview:
capricorn goat of epic intensity who is a wizard with most things computer related. bedroom geek turned social serial networker and idea factory im passionate about working with like minded people who see the benefit of modelling the technology tools to all abilities - whilst taking the mystery out of computing tasks i work together with clients to create a useable media pipeline which works alongside or as part of your busy day-to-day life.

originally started out as a computer operator after deciding on a career in computing after watching too many cheesy 80’s movies from america suggesting that computing was a cool career to get into and also getting caught up in the personal computer explosion in england in my teens sealed my future in this space.

with roles in operations, switching up to creative role when the tools matured i know how to provide you with the extra attention to detail that you expect whilst highlighting potential ways of communicating it out to the wider online digitally connected (and sometimes disconnected) world in a way you might not have thought of yet. as a social media ninja these day video making, audio interviewing and blogging about products, services and events. working with clients on a one-to-one basis, he also gives talks and lectures and is keen to recommend software tools and training for small to medium size business.
